ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISNULL( Key_Date_Offset_Upper_Boundary__c ) ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Key_Date_Offset_Upper_Boundary__c ) ), Key_Date_Offset_Lower_Boundary__c > Key_Date_Offset_Upper_Boundary__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Key Date Upper Boundary must be greater than the Key Date Lower Boundary
